definition: adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack
old wine in a new bottle (idiom)
lit. new wine in old bottles; fig. new concepts in an old framework/(loan idiom from Matthew 9:17, but fig. meaning is opposite)

sentences.english: Or was it something in the expensive bottled water in Beverly Hills where Oscar organizers are based.
sentences.chinese: 也許是因爲貝弗利山昂貴的瓶裝水中有些莫名物質。

sentences.english: This is the most recent major report on bottled water safety.
sentences.chinese: 這是最近的一次關於瓶裝水安全問題的報告。

sentences.english: Some of the lawmakers questioned the need for more regulation of bottled water.
sentences.chinese: 一些立法者質疑瓶裝水需要更嚴格管理的看法。

sentences.english: Houlihan says 25 percent of bottled waters are simply "tap water in a bottle."
sentences.chinese: 胡莉說，25%的瓶裝水就是裝在瓶子裏的自來水。

sentences.english: Draft beer or in a bottle?
sentences.chinese: 要生啤酒還是瓶裝的呢？

sentences.english: The utility model provides an easily opened cover for bottled can, and the utility model has a novel structure.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型推出了一種結構新穎的瓶裝罐頭易開蓋。

sentences.english: Taxes on a six-pack of beer would jump from 33 cents to 81 cents, for example.
sentences.chinese: 六瓶裝的啤酒的稅負從33美分提高到81美分。

sentences.english: Dual side open-top pouches are great places to hold bottled beverages.
sentences.chinese: 雙端開頂袋舉行瓶裝飲料的好地方。

sentences.english: The pickled vegetable of bottled coriander heart is convenient and high quality.
sentences.chinese: 瓶裝香菜心醬菜，香味濃郁，脆爽可口，是方便。

sentences.english: The apartment was centrally heated,and we had bottled gas to cook with.
sentences.chinese: 公寓套間集中供熱，我們有瓶裝煤氣做飯。

sentences.english: Soft drinks are included in the price, but bottled drinks are extra.
sentences.chinese: 無酒精飲料包含在餐費裏，但瓶裝飲料另計。

sentences.english: We have draft and bottled beer.
sentences.chinese: 我們有生啤酒和瓶裝啤酒。

sentences.english: What's the difference between a hospital and a bottling factory?
sentences.chinese: 醫院和瓶裝廠的區別在哪裏呢？

sentences.english: Carrying bottled water is on its way to being as cool as smoking while pregnant.
sentences.chinese: 喝瓶裝水就快變得跟孕婦抽菸一樣噁心。

sentences.english: Dr Pepper also has a very small bottled-water business.
sentences.chinese: 該公司還有一塊規模很小的瓶裝水業務。

sentences.english: We have draft and bottle beer.
sentences.chinese: 我們有扎啤和瓶裝啤酒。

definition: loose goods/goods sold open/draft (of beer, as opposed to bottled)
to brew/to make (wine, vinegar, soybean paste etc) by fermentation
date of use (on foodstuffs)/best before date
